类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: I purchased an XXL based on reviews and should have sized down for a more tapered waist look. For reference I am 5’3 and currently 200lbs. I am very curvy with an ample booty and 36H bra size. The con in getting the XXL is the waist was not tapered and I don’t have a large waist line or “Mommy Pouch”. A XL would have given me a better look. Even though it wasn’t as tapered as I would have liked it was still beautiful. The colors were very vibrant against my dark brown skin tone. The back is out but I wore a red bra so it blended with the dress. The front fit well without being too big. Someone suggested bra or clothing tape. I did not need it at all. If you have smaller cup size such as a DD or smaller and you need a XXL then the front may need to be held with a pin or broach. The length was perfect for me and if it was a bit shorter I would have been fine with it. I wore 3 1/2 inch red sandals. I am at my heaviest weight and plan to drop down in size in the next couple of months. I will repurchase in a size L and M to determine which fits better. I am going in a cruise and would like to wear this dress. I will gift this to someone else in the family.

Great transition dress. Super cute & comfy. Can be worn with boots, sandals, or sneakers. Well made. Lined & not scratchy. Wore in Vegas on a cool night with boots. For reference I’m 5’4, 125 lbs. and small fit great.

My 14yo Freshman daughter is very modest but wanted a dress to go with her School HOCO theme of "Love Island". We ordered 3 dresses, which were all very cute but this one was the winner because it looked really pretty and elegant/stylish and she was able to wear a tank top with the V neck shape of the dress without it looking "off" or "out of place". The waist had a beautiful detail ruffle which highlighted her figure and the sleeves are sheer so this dress offered coverage for the Fall weather and her modest nature but also had a light feel to fit in with the theme. She was very happy with the dress and the price point is completely worth it! She can also wear this dress on other occasions (I might even have to borrow it!). BEST PART???....she felt beautiful and confident, I mean....look at her beautiful face/smile.
The dress itself is very cute, buuut is NOT true to size, it runs small
Bought this for a wedding and found myself wearing it more than once for different occasions. Super nice inner lining. Fits a little big but otherwise very cute.

I’m absolutely obsessed with the Dokotoo Women’s Deep V Neck Dress! This dress has quickly become my go-to for every occasion, and I can’t count the number of compliments I’ve received when I wear it. The deep V-neck and backless design give it a stunning, elegant flair, while the ruffle details add a playful touch. I loved it so much that I ended up buying it in multiple colors! It’s incredibly versatile—perfect for everything from work to weddings. I can easily dress it up with heels or keep it casual with flats, making it suitable for any event. The flowy fabric is super comfortable, and I always feel fabulous in it. Just a heads up—if you don’t have boobs bigger than a C cup, this might not fit as well. If you’re looking for a dress that combines style and comfort, this is definitely the one!

评论详情: I ordered this dress for a wedding guest option. I absolutely love this dress. Looks identical to the photo described, very pretty! I ordered a medium, I’m 145 pounds, smaller chest. I could have done a small but medium was good! Highly recommend.

I ordered this dress in a Medium. I am 5ft 6in, 145 lbs and DDD bra. This is a beautiful flowing dress that’s perfect for a summer or spring event. I am top heavy so I also purchased the Vinperfor Low Back Bra on Amazon so that I could have support as well as no bra lines showing in the back of the dress. I wore this to my mom’s milestone birthday celebration and felt pretty all day :-) I just ordered the brown/black version of this dress in Large. I wanted to try a larger size to see if it made any difference in the hang of the dress or how the back fits. The large gave me more room in the waist, which I did not need and don’t necessarily like. It did not provide more space in the breast area or the back, which I did not need but would not have minded at all. Overall this is a girly fun whimsical dress and I am happy with both of my purchases.

I get so many compliments on this outfit! It looks so great with a fun platform or sandal. If you are tall, you could get away with wearing a tight white jean. 评论概述: Exactly as pictured, but had to adjust neckline
评论详情: I knew when I bought this dress that the neckline was going to be plunging and I'd have to make a small sewing adjustment - which I ended up doing (sewed up about 1 inch from bottom of v-neck). Not very stretchy material but I think I could have sized down from S to XS as the waist area was a little looser on me. Usually I'm a US size S.  5 stars because the color, fit, fabric, and lining was exactly as expected. Not see-through at all. Since it is polyester you should expect it to be a little less breathable than natural fibers, and I also found that it clung to my body a little bit from static and/or sweat. I've worn it maybe 10 times already and put it through the wash and line dried each time - still looks new!

I originally purchased this dress for a bridal shower. I got the sage green color in size S and I am 130 lb 5'5 for reference. I was debating if I wanted to wear this or not due to the lack of support in the chest area. The way the dress dips into a deep V makes it a little challenging to wear a regular bra. I also want to note that the S was too big on me and I probably needed to size down to an XS so that had an impact on the tightness of the top part. It was super cute on, I will say but the only issue was that I felt a little too exposed in the chest area for a bridal shower. Maybe if I had a smaller size, it would have fit a little better in that area but I didn't have enough time to order a new one unfortunately. Very cute dress though, I would consider ordering a smaller size next time I had an event coming up.

For reference, I am 6’0, 190 lbs. I originally ordered the light green in a L, but it was slightly too small, so I ordered an XL. The dress itself is beautiful, but I received my second order with no zipper so I will be returning it :(  I am a 36DD, and the neckline was a little low, but nothing a safety pin can’t fix :)
